column1: # Crossrail is a 118km railway line with 42km of new tunnels beneath London
# Deepest point: Liverpool Street at ~41m below ground
# Main trunk: Heathrow to Whitechapel (west to east)
# Abbey Wood branch: Canary Wharf south-east to Abbey Wood (tunnelled under Thames)
# Shenfield branch: Stratford north-east to Shenfield (surface railway)
